full_summary:
====================================

### Tender Notice for Halifax Class Spares - Circuit Cards

#### Reference Number: cb-451-16522362

#### Solicitation Number: W8482-252823/A

The tender call of the Department of National Defence for Halifax Class Spares - Circuit Cards is currently closed. Please see attachments for tender documentation.

#### Overview

The Department of National Defence requires circuit card assemblies for the Halifax Class ships. The requirement is for 100 units, broken down into two line items:

*   50 units of circuit card assembly, Part Number: RSFM-2-0201, to be delivered to CFB Halifax
*   50 units of circuit card assembly, Part Number: RSFM-2-0201, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt

#### Tender Details

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia and British Columbia

#### Contracting Entity

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of National Defence
*   **Contracting Entity Address:**
    *   101 Colonel By Drive
    *   Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Christopher Cauchi
    *   christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca
    *   (555) 555-5555

#### Technical Specifications

*   **Line Item 001:**
    *   Item: Circuit Card Assembly
    *   Part Number: RSFM-2-0201
    *   Quantity: 50 units
    *   Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
    *   Destination: CFB Halifax
*   **Line Item 002:**
    *   Item: Circuit Card Assembly
    *   Part Number: RSFM-2-0201
    *   Quantity: 50 units
    *   Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
    *   Destination: CFB Esquimalt

### Attachments

The tender documentation can be downloaded from the following links:

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41723/w8482-252823---rfp---en.pdf (English)
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
